channel.title: Week2s on XTERN Bootcamp 2017
channel.description: Recent content in Week2s on XTERN Bootcamp 2017

item.title: Day 5: Intro to React
item.description: Monday, July 3, 2017 Lecture Videos Homework review: Day 5, part 1 React: Session 2 videos Topics Wrapping up Michael Baywatch contentEditable (MDN: Making content editable) Font Awesome HTML 5 localStorage JSON.stringify() JSON.parse() ES2015+ (ES6+) Inheritance (with the ES2015 class syntax; it’s still prototypal inheritance though) - ES2015 classes on Babel Modules (import/export) - ES2015 modules on Babel React Imperative vs.

item.title: Day 6: React
item.description: Wednesday, July 5, 2017 Lecture Videos Day 6, part 1 Pending Topics React Using map with components Stateless Functional Components Functional Stateless Components in React Functional Components vs. Stateless Functional Components vs. Stateless Components Nine Wins You Might Have Overlooked JavaScript Named and default exports Named and default imports Package Managers NPM - Node Package Manager Yarn - Facebook’s version of npm Examples React Using map with Components See this example live on CodePen →

item.title: Day 7: Props and Destructuring
item.description: Thursday, July 6, 2017 Lecture Videos Morning: Day 7, part 1 Afternoon: Day 7, part 1 Topics React Methods as props Controlled vs Uncontrolled Forms Controlled and uncontrolled form inputs in React don’t have to be complicated Component lifecycle methods (Docs) componentDidMount() JavaScript Destructuring assignment Spread operator Property initializers (and arrow functions) Firebase ↓ Getting started Re-base for syncing React state with Firebase Examples React Methods as props Sometimes one component needs to update another component’s state.
